references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of adversarial patches, introducing a technique that has been widely adopted and adapted in subsequent research.

references.paper_title: Accessorize to a crime: Real and stealthy attacks on state-of-the-art face recognition
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on physical adversarial attacks, demonstrating the feasibility of real-world attacks against facial recognition systems.
Generative adversarial networks (GANs) are a fundamental concept in machine learning used to train the differentiable camera ISP proxy network in this paper
This paper is a seminal work in adversarial machine learning, highlighting the vulnerability of neural networks to adversarial examples and influencing much subsequent work in the area.

references.paper_title: Histograms of oriented gradients for human detection
references.reason: The Histograms of Oriented Gradients (HOG) feature descriptor is a fundamental component of many object detection systems and is used in this work as the victim model.
